name: In re Appeal of GULPH MILLS GOLF CLUB from the Decision Dated May 31, 2001 of the Board of Supervisors of the Township of Upper Merion. Appeal of Gulph Mills Golf Club. O'Neill Properties Group, L.P., Intervenor
name_abbreviation: In re Appeal of Gulph Mills Golf Club

judges: Before: CAPPY, C.J., and CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN, SAYLOR, EAKIN and BAER, JJ.
parties: In re Appeal of GULPH MILLS GOLF CLUB from the Decision Dated May 31, 2001 of the Board of Supervisors of the Township of Upper Merion. Appeal of Gulph Mills Golf Club. O’Neill Properties Group, L.P., Intervenor.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The Order of the Commonwealth Court is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Albert C. Oehrle, Norristown, Dana T. Rieder, for Gulph Mills Golf Club, appellant.
Joseph J. Pizonka, King Of Prussia, for Upper Merion Tp.
Robert J. Kerns, Lansdale, for O’Neill Properties Group, L.P., Intervenor-appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
860 A.2d 487
In re Appeal of GULPH MILLS GOLF CLUB from the Decision Dated May 31, 2001 of the Board of Supervisors of the Township of Upper Merion. Appeal of Gulph Mills Golf Club. O’Neill Properties Group, L.P., Intervenor.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 20, 2004.
Decided Nov. 8, 2004.
Albert C. Oehrle, Norristown, Dana T. Rieder, for Gulph Mills Golf Club, appellant.
Joseph J. Pizonka, King Of Prussia, for Upper Merion Tp.
Robert J. Kerns, Lansdale, for O’Neill Properties Group, L.P., Intervenor-appellee.
Before: CAPPY, C.J., and CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN, SAYLOR, EAKIN and BAER, JJ.
